options.label: 送货仓库名称
options.name: warehouseName
options.validate: [{"type":"length","rule":{"max":100,"maxm":"送货仓库名称长度不能大于100个字符"}},{"type":"required","rule":{"m":"送货仓库名称不能为空"}}]

options.label: 送货地址
options.name: sendAddress
options.validate: [{"type":"length","rule":{"max":400,"maxm":"送货地址长度不能大于400个字符"}},{"type":"required","rule":{"m":"送货地址不能为空"}}]

options.label: 送货仓库编码
options.name: warehouseCode
options.validate: [{"type":"length","rule":{"max":100,"maxm":"送货仓库编码长度不能大于100个字符"}}]

options.label: 供应商仓库编码
options.name: vendorWarehouseCode
options.validate: [{"type":"length","rule":{"max":100,"maxm":"供应商仓库编码长度不能大于100个字符"}}]

options.label: 收货联系人电话
options.name: receiverPhone
options.validate: [{"type":"length","rule":{"max":100,"maxm":"收货联系人电话长度不能大于100个字符"}}]
